pubmed._note: PubMed/MEDLINE via NCBI E-Utilities. Free, no API key required (10 req/sec without key, 30 req/sec with NCBI_API_KEY). For higher throughput, set NCBI_API_KEY in env.

biomcp._note: BioMCP: PubMed + Europe PMC + bioRxiv/medRxiv + ClinicalTrials.gov + genomic variants. Requires Python 3.10+ (system Python 3.9.6, must specify --python 3.11). Installed 80 packages on first run.

_verified: 2026-02-15. Both servers tested with live queries. PubMed returned 575 results for 'working memory training ADHD'. BioMCP returned 7+ papers with DOIs for keyword='working memory' disease='ADHD'.
